title: Mapped Out, Ep. 7: Least Changes
description: The new redistricting maps proposed by Republican leaders in the state Legislature are based on the old maps approved in 2011. And while it may have been obscured by the partisan bickering that greeted the proposal, an important question emerges: Can the map that helped Republicans cement their majorities for the past decade be reused for the next 10 years?
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
